name: Action-Adventure 3D Low Poly Game
description:
We are 2 Indie Developers who are creating an adventure-action low poly game.

Join our discord community server to be a part of this game ;D

Link: https://discord.gg/bdDJBY6una

Now, we are in 2nd week of development.

You can test our demo and give us feedback on "feedback" channel on discord!
